data.name: Grimgrad
data.detailed_description:
Build your settlements to survive all the hardships of the dark Slavic Middle Ages and not to anger gods. Create residential and industrial districts, lay roads, pay attention to villagers' needs, and manage resources wisely.

Features:

  • Easy to start playing, even if you are new to city-building games.
  • Live game world. Communicate with Slavic gods, fight plague, rats, hunger, predators, and weather. Use executions, heretics, and nobles for your purposes.
  • Issue decrees, developing in three directions: Church, Nobles, Government.
  • Many random events. Your decisions have consequences, and incidents will require you to change your strategy in time.

data.short_description: Build your settlements to survive all the hardships of the dark Slavic Middle Ages and not to anger gods!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Phenom II X4 with at least 2,5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 460/Radeon HD 5850/Intel HD 4600 with at least 1024 MB video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 or AMD Phenom II X6 with at least 3,5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 660/Radeon HD 6970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
